title: Man's Death Goes Unnoticed For 30 Hours In China Internet Cafe
content: The employees of the cafe thought the man was fast asleep and they didn't bother to wake him up.
summary: The employees of the cafe thought the man was fast asleep and they didn't bother to wake him up.

title: Big Salamander-Like Creature Roamed Namibia 280 Million Years Ago
content: About 280 million years ago, a large creature built somewhat like a salamander but with frightful fangs prowled the swamps and lakes of what is now Namibia, ambushing prey as a top predator in a chilly ecosystem l
summary: About 280 million years ago, a large creature built somewhat like a salamander but with frightful fangs prowled the swamps and lakes of what is now Namibia, ambushing prey as a top predator in a chilly ecosystem l

title: China Man, 65, Hits Woman For Not Giving Him Seat In Metro, Detained
content: The man said in the clip, "Call the police, we'll go to the police station, and you can say I'm harassing you."
summary: The man said in the clip, "Call the police, we'll go to the police station, and you can say I'm harassing you."

title: Cost Of Living For British Indian Voters Could Trump Rishi Sunak's Pride
content: The UK's historic general election on Thursday marks the first real test at the ballot box for Rishi Sunak when pride in Britain's first Prime Minister of Indian heritage might be trumped by the cost-of-living crisis and sheer fatigue with 14 long ye
summary: The UK's historic general election on Thursday marks the first real test at the ballot box for Rishi Sunak when pride in Britain's first Prime Minister of Indian heritage might be trumped by the cost-of-living crisis and sheer fatigue with 14 long ye

title: Suspect In Slovak PM Shooting Faces Charge Of Carrying Out Terrorist Attack
content: The man detained over the shooting of Slovak Prime Minister Robert Fico will face prosecution on the charge of carrying out a terrorist attack, Slovakia's general prosecutor said on Thursday.
summary: The man detained over the shooting of Slovak Prime Minister Robert Fico will face prosecution on the charge of carrying out a terrorist attack, Slovakia's general prosecutor said on Thursday.

title: Saudi Netflix Show Creator Faces Terrorism Charge, 13-Year Travel Ban
content: Saudi TV creator Abdulaziz Almuzaini, whose animated Netflix show has made waves for breaking social taboos, said he had been convicted by an anti-terrorism court, prompting condemnation from rights advocates.
summary: Saudi TV creator Abdulaziz Almuzaini, whose animated Netflix show has made waves for breaking social taboos, said he had been convicted by an anti-terrorism court, prompting condemnation from rights advocates.

title: 3 Swedish Citizens Given Death Sentences In Iraq Over Shooting
content: Three Swedish citizens have been sentenced to death in Iraq over their involvement in a shooting and a fourth may also face the same punishment over a separate crime, the Swedish foreign ministry said on Thursday.
summary: Three Swedish citizens have been sentenced to death in Iraq over their involvement in a shooting and a fourth may also face the same punishment over a separate crime, the Swedish foreign ministry said on Thursday.

title: Russian Armour-Piercing Tank Rounds To Be Made In India, Says Moscow Firm
content: Russia's vast state-owned Rostec corporation said on Thursday that its weapons export unit had organised the production in India of armour-piercing rounds for Russian-made battle tanks.
summary: Russia's vast state-owned Rostec corporation said on Thursday that its weapons export unit had organised the production in India of armour-piercing rounds for Russian-made battle tanks.

title: Putin, Xi Rally Against External Influence At Central Asian Summit
content: The leaders of China and Russia on Thursday urged their allies and partners to resist malign external influence, advancing their shared anti-Western agenda at a regional summit in Central Asia.
summary: The leaders of China and Russia on Thursday urged their allies and partners to resist malign external influence, advancing their shared anti-Western agenda at a regional summit in Central Asia.

title: Biden "Absolutely Not" Pulling Of US Presidential Race, Says White House
content: Joe Biden is "absolutely not" pulling out of the US presidential race, his spokeswoman said Wednesday, as pressure mounted following his disastrous debate performance against Donald Trump.
summary: Joe Biden is "absolutely not" pulling out of the US presidential race, his spokeswoman said Wednesday, as pressure mounted following his disastrous debate performance against Donald Trump.

title: Trump's Campaign, Allies Target Kamala Harris Amid Biden Replacement Buzz
content: Donald Trump's campaign and some of his allies have launched a pre-emptive political strike on Vice President Kamala Harris, moving swiftly to try to discredit her amid talk among some of her fellow Democrats that she might replace President Biden.
summary: Donald Trump's campaign and some of his allies have launched a pre-emptive political strike on Vice President Kamala Harris, moving swiftly to try to discredit her amid talk among some of her fellow Democrats that she might replace President Biden.

title: "Isolate, Expose Countries That Harbour Terrorists": India At SCO Summit
content: India on Thursday asked the international community to "isolate and expose" those countries that harbour terrorists, provide safe havens and condone terrorism, saying that if left unchecked, terrorism can become a major threat to regional and global
summary: India on Thursday asked the international community to "isolate and expose" those countries that harbour terrorists, provide safe havens and condone terrorism, saying that if left unchecked, terrorism can become a major threat to regional and global

title: Indian-Origin Schoolgirl Chess Prodigy To Be Youngest In England Team
content: Bodhana, from Harrow in north-west London, will join the England Women's Team at the Chess Olympiad in Budapest, Hungary, in September.
summary: Bodhana, from Harrow in north-west London, will join the England Women's Team at the Chess Olympiad in Budapest, Hungary, in September.

title: Labour Party Tipped For Landslide Win As UK Votes In Historic Polls
content: Britain voted Thursday in a general election widely expected to hand the opposition Labour party a landslide win and end nearly a decade-and-a-half of Conservative rule.
summary: Britain voted Thursday in a general election widely expected to hand the opposition Labour party a landslide win and end nearly a decade-and-a-half of Conservative rule.

title: Hurricane Beryl Powers Towards Mexico After Battering Jamaica
content: Hurricane Beryl powered towards Mexico and the Cayman Islands early Thursday, threatening strong winds and a storm surge after battering Jamaica's southern coast.
summary: Hurricane Beryl powered towards Mexico and the Cayman Islands early Thursday, threatening strong winds and a storm surge after battering Jamaica's southern coast.

title: Over 200 Rockets Fired At Israel Military Bases, Claims Hezbollah
content: Lebanon's Hezbollah said it launched "more than 200" rockets at Israeli military positions Thursday in response to a strike that killed a senior commander of the Iran-backed group.
summary: Lebanon's Hezbollah said it launched "more than 200" rockets at Israeli military positions Thursday in response to a strike that killed a senior commander of the Iran-backed group.

title: Britons Start Voting In Election Expected To Propel Labour To Power
content: Britons began voting on Thursday in a parliamentary election that is expected to bring Keir Starmer's Labour Party to power, sweeping away Prime Minister Rishi Sunak's Conservatives after 14 often turbulent years.
summary: Britons began voting on Thursday in a parliamentary election that is expected to bring Keir Starmer's Labour Party to power, sweeping away Prime Minister Rishi Sunak's Conservatives after 14 often turbulent years.

title: Ukraines Forces Withdraw From Key Eastern Town As Russia Claims Control
content: Ukraine said Thursday its forces had withdrawn from a district in the key eastern town of Chasiv Yar, where Russian forces have recently claimed several advances.
summary: Ukraine said Thursday its forces had withdrawn from a district in the key eastern town of Chasiv Yar, where Russian forces have recently claimed several advances.

title: Odds Against Him, UK PM Rishi Sunak Casts Vote With Wife Akshata Murty
content: UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak urged voters to choose the Conservative party as polling booths opened across thecountry for the general election.He shared a photo with his wife, Akshata Murty, at a polling booth.
summary: UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak urged voters to choose the Conservative party as polling booths opened across thecountry for the general election.He shared a photo with his wife, Akshata Murty, at a polling booth.

title: Amid Biden Drop-Out Buzz, Kamala Harris' Balancing Act
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris is engaged in a delicate balancing act, playing cheerleader for President Joe Biden while standing by as a leading contender to replace him if he ends his reelection bid.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris is engaged in a delicate balancing act, playing cheerleader for President Joe Biden while standing by as a leading contender to replace him if he ends his reelection bid.
